title: ambA unaiyE
sahitya:
amba unaiyE nambinEn trijagadamba kaDaikkaN pArttaruL kalpaka-


anupallavi

  vempavamenum kaDal naDuvilE vIzhnduDal kai kAl shOrndanavE kalpakA-


caraNam    ellaiyillk-kavalai nOigaL iravu paghal ennai varutteDukkudE
tollaiyaTra anbarkkinbam aruLum jyOti kapAliyin pAdi udal vaLar
